fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Attack a player for 0 HP. Grabs the target's Defense card if defended.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Attack a player 3 times for 0 HP each. Grabs the target's Defense card(s) if defended.

*Takes an unmodified version of the Defense card. Each disguised attack can grab only 1 Defense card. Grabbed mechanically means their Defense card was not played, however the target will be shown to have defended. The target player will learn they were Grabbed.*
